ch.nolix.interfaces.util

Interface Namable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Area, BorderableRectangle, Button, ClassableNamableElement, Container, Definition, DialogContainer, Equality, Expression, Grid, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, Label, NamableElement, Rectangle, Scope, SingleContainer, TabContainer, TextBox, TextLineRectangle, Theory, VerticalLine, VerticalStack

    public interface Namable
    A namable element is an element that can have optionally a name.

    • Method Summary
